CS2316 Fall 2015 Practice Quiz 7

1P. Review the glossarys in Chapters 15 & 16 of How to Think Like a
    Computer Scientist




2P. If you are asked to write a function in Python that will take in two
    numbers as parameters and calculate their sum, would you:

	a. Have the function print the result?
	b. Have the function return the result?
	c. Have the function print and return the result?
	d. Have the function neither return nor print the result?


3P. Do you like Object-Oriented Programming? Why?
